import {useState,useEffect} from "react"; function Footer({checkedState}){ const [count,setCount] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { checkedState.forEach(state => state ? setCount(count - 1) : setCount(count + 1)) },[checkedState]) return(
{count} items left
  • All
  • Active
  • Completed

) } export default Footer;
